meanings.definition: A type of possum found in Australia and New Guinea.
meanings.sent1: The cuscuses are cute animals with fluffy tails.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of cuscuses climbing trees in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The cuscuses decided to have a tail-fluffing competition for fun.
meanings.sent4: The cuscuses in the trees looked like little acrobats performing tricks.
meanings.sent5: The image of the cuscuses hanging upside down will stay with me forever.

meanings.definition: The plural form of cuscus, referring to more than one of these animals.
meanings.sent1: Look at all the cuscuses playing together in the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The cuscuses in the exhibit seemed very active and playful.
meanings.sent3: The cuscuses organized a party to celebrate their new treehouse.
meanings.sent4: The forest was alive with the sounds of chattering cuscuses.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the cuscuses munching on leaves was quite amusing.
